comment.author: Charla
comment.text: He dosnt believe a word he's saying he's just saying things to pander to his crowd I wish he did mean it but there proof he doesn't

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: Charla . NO ONE could keep up a schedule as Mr. Trump has over the last 15 or so months. It would be too grueling for someone who does not believe in what he is doing! I believe your comment is all WET!

replies.author: Charla
replies.text: Do you know what an individual mandate is? he keeps saying he wants to repeal and replace Obamacare and his plan is to replace it with Obamacare. It's proof he doesn't know what he's talking about or even care

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: Jordan grow a brain. Tape your mouth shut. I t does not have a brain attached to it.
